fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47422].
  {panel}

This question:
https://answers.atlassian.com/questions/25115/mobile-connect-jira-plugin-not-working

Should show here:
https://answers.atlassian.com/questions/tagged/jira-mobile-connect/

Something appears to be wrong with the search or tagging mechanism.
fields.summary: Question is not showing when browsing a tag
Make User Hover appear after a delay and disappear on mouse move

fields.description:
I've got an 404 error while I was removing my subscriptions (in email notification preferences)

To reproduce:
- make sure you have enough subscriptions for a second (or third) page.
- when you unsubscribe to the last subscription on that page, you'll get an 404 error.

I would expect to go back to the previous page when I removed the last subscription on the current page.
fields.summary: Page not found when removing subscriptions.
Ask a question template is appearing as a string in the space templates admin screen

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa} *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47418]. {panel} I'm getting this error Error: The XML content could not be parsed. There is a problem at line 1, column 7161. Parser message: Unexpected EOF; was expecting a close tag for element

at [row,col {unknown-source}]: [1,7161] in my page https://toushay.jira.com/wiki/display/RandD/App+development+Acceleration
fields.summary: XML Error (The XML content could not be parsed).

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47417].
  {panel}

h3. Summary
Topics cannot be deleted even if there are no questions or watchers
h3. Environment
(Optional - If Applicable)
* Questions for Confluence Plugin 2.4.1-D20151021T063334
* Firefox, Chrome
* Windows, Mac

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create a topic
# Delete the topic

h3. Expected Results
Topic is deleted
h3. Actual Results
There are no actions after user click on Delete button. Delete button will be grayed out

 !Screen Shot 2015-11-10 at 5.35.42 PM.png|thumbnail!  

h3. Notes
Topic cannot be deleted after questions and watchers are removed

h3.Workaround
No workaround at the moment
fields.summary: Topics cannot be deleted

fields.description:
Quoted text doesn't wrap correctly, so it continues under the right-hand menu.

Verified in FireFox (3.6), IE7 and Chrome

Please see attached screenshot.
fields.summary: Quoted text appears under right-hand menu

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47414].
  {panel}

Hey guys, I use answers.atlassian.com every day, and today something strange has happened -- all answers are translated into Russian language! It seems to be a Google auto-translation, or something else. I'm a Russian and I can read Russian ok, but the problem is that automatic translation often makes no sense at all. Is this a new feature? Please let me turn it off!

Strangely though, the questions are still in English.

Thanks for your support!
Igor
fields.summary: All answers are translated to Russian

  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47410].
  {panel}

+To Reproduce+
# click Get Started in the CQ section of the UPM
# ask a question
# use the drop down to ask in a space
# save question

+Expected Result+
Question is asked in that space

+Actual Result+
Action not permitted

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47404].
  {panel}

On a server,
make sure you have a questions draft in the database
Add a page
Add the Content By User macro
It renders blank when it should render the content.

{code}

fields.summary: Questions Drafts causes the Content By User Macro to render blank
Option to ban spammers has gone

fields.description:
Hi,

I was trying to post this question:

{panel}
Hi,



there is an open question in the old forum under http://forums.atlassian.com/thread.jspa?threadID=54288 . I'm running into the same problem. Is there a solution?



Thanks 

Eike
{panel}

With the following headline and tags:

.h3 Unable to "start work"

tags: IDE-Connector, Intellij, IDEA
fields.summary: Unable to post a question - SPAM
Improve performance: javascript  and css loading
Spam user's negative score does not equal their report karma points.
Add ability to get a user through API, using their email address
Bounty Has a bug

  {panel}

This is happening fairly rarely. 2 instances in 2 weeks.

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47394].
  {panel}

{panel}
h3. Summary

When trying to edit the permissions for Questions for Confluence, an error occurs.
h3. Environment
 * Confluence 1000.223.0
 * Questions for Confluence 2.4.14-D20160804T002212
h3. Steps to Reproduce
 # Go to *General Configuration* >> *Permissions* (under the Questions for Confluence section)
 # Click the *Edit Permissions* button.
h3. Expected Results

You are taken to the page where you can edit permissions for the add-on.
h3. Actual Results

Page loads at: https://<HOSTNAME>.atlassian.net/wiki/admin/questions/editpermissions.action
 The below exception is thrown:
{noformat}
 javax.servlet.ServletException: Servlet execution threw an exception
     at org.apache.catalina.core.ApplicationFilterChain.internalDoFilter(ApplicationFilterChain.java:326)

caused by: java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: com.atlassian.confluence.security.administrators.EditGlobalPermissionsAdministrator.<init>(Lcom/atlassian/confluence/security/SpacePermissionManager;Lcom/atlassian/confluence/security/administrators/PermissionResolver;Lcom/atlassian/confluence/security/SetSpacePermissionChecker;Lcom/atlassian/confluence/user/SearchEntitiesManager;Lcom/atlassian/confluence/util/UserChecker;Lcom/atlassian/confluence/user/UserAccessor;)V
     at com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.questions.actions.admin.ExtendedEditPermissionsAdministrator.<init>(ExtendedEditPermissionsAdministrator.java:37)

{noformat}
h3. Workaround

There is no workaround. 
  
{panel}
fields.summary: Cannot edit permissions for Questions for Confluence

fields.description:
When linking external URLs, space char '  ' is HTLM encoded.
Example: 'https://jira.atlassian.com/browse/JRA-1330 ' <--- Space here.

=> 'https://jira.atlassian.com/browse/JRA-1330 '

See for instance: https://answers.atlassian.com/questions/8665/how-can-we-implement-the-concept-of-a-customer-entity-in-jira

URL should be trimmed if not properly encoded by the user.
fields.summary: Bad URL encoding

fields.description:
h3. Summary

The keyboard shortcut for inserting a image(CTRL + M) is not working in the 2.3.0 version.
The others are working properly(_like CTRL+B to bold the characters_). Just this one that isn't.


h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Go to the question.
# Insert a new answer.
# Press CTRL + M to insert a file

h3. Expected Results
The *Insert files and images* page will pop up. 

h3. Actual Results
Nothing happens
 
h3. Notes
Happening on OSX as well.

h3.Workaround
Use the mouse pointer to insert the file/image
fields.summary: Keybord Shortcut (CTRL + M) to insert file or images is not working

fields.description:
Anonymous users are not able to contribute content in Confluence Questions, they must login first.

If an anonymous user tries to add a new comment to answer, they receive a nice helpful error message when they click on 'Comment':

[^newcomment.png]

However, if an anonymous user tries to add a new comment to an existing comment thread (by clicking in the 'add your comment' input area), they receive no error until they hit the Comment button, at which point an "undefined" error message is displayed:

[^commenterror.png]

This isn't a great user experience.
fields.summary: Anonymous users see a JavaScript error when trying to add a new comment to an existing comment thread

fields.description:
h3. Summary
Creating a question whose title contains only symbols (e.g. "?", "////", "?;?") does not allow the question to be viewed. Clicking on a link to the question will redirect the user to the site dashboard. This behaviour results in the user not being able to delete the question since they can't open the question to delete it.

Note: If the question title has any text after the symbol (e.g. "? Why?"), it works as expected.

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Install the Confluence Questions add-on.
# Create a new question that contains *only* symbols (e.g. "?", "////", "?;?").
# Try to view the question.

h3. Expected Results
The page with the question will appear.

h3. Actual Results
User is redirected to their site dashboard instead.
fields.summary: Questions that contain only symbols can't be opened

fields.description:
We have users whose user Ids are numeric, and they are right-justified with zeroes. For example, a user has user Id: "000005284". When an attempt is made to view this users reputation in Confluence Questions, no data is displayed. This is because the underlying REST call to /experts/reputation/timeseries is turning the user name into a number, and dropping the leading zeroes. Analyzing the web traffic shows that the application is attempting to use this URI:
https://host/rest/questions/1.0/experts/reputation/timeseries?username=5284&_=1459856509109

This results in an HTTP 400 status. If you change the above URI to restore the leading zeroes, the call completes successfully. 

I would suspect that this bug occurs in other situations as well.
fields.summary: User Reputation does not Display if User Name is Numeric and Right Justified with Zeroes

fields.description:
h3. Summary
Having more than one attachment to a questions results in all attachments to be lost when editing the question. 

h3. Environment
* Confluence 5.9.2
* This issue can be seen immediately in Firefox and Internet Explorer.

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create a question. 
# Add 2 images in the question. Save the question
 !screenshot-2.png|thumbnail! 
# Edit the question and modify something. Save the question

h3. Expected Results
Images are shown

h3. Actual Results
Images are broken
 !screenshot-1.png|thumbnail! 

More details in the Video attached

h3. Notes:
1.  Attachments in the answer(s) don't cause any problems.

2. This issue can be seen in Google Chrome as well although not able to reliably replicated at the moment.

3. After some search in the database, the new content ID does not exist in the database.
Example: the new image link is {{http://localhost:8592/confluence/display/592TES/questions/1245302/test-test-test}}
searching {{select * from content where contentid = 1245302}} yields nothing from the database

h3. Workaround
No workaround
fields.summary: Broken images after editing a question
